title: So Much Suffering: Dylan van Baarle Must Be the Unluckiest Rider in Pro Cycling
content:
Van Baarle's broken collarbone at the Tour Down Under continues a streak of utter calamity for cycling's cursed cobblestone contender.

Read the full article at So Much Suffering: Dylan van Baarle Must Be the Unluckiest Rider in Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
